item.description:
Best Ever



SINGLES DANCE AND SO MUCH MORE



Learn all about Vodka…. Specialty Vodka Drinks



Eat, drink, mingle and dance the night away



Plenty of Slow Dances……Yay……



There’s Enough Summer Left for a Summertime Romance . . .



That could turn into something more – you never know!!



SAVE THE DATE BELOW: ( Put on your wall calendar/enter in your cell phone/ even put on your bathroom walls. You get the idea—Save the Date: !!!





Friday, August 13, 6 p.m.



6:00P.M. – 8:00P.M. Cocktails/Food/Chit Chat

8:00 P.M. Let the music move you and put you in a party mood. A “cool DJ” will be doing the spinning and happy to play your requested sounds.



The Delaney House, One Country Club Rd., Holyoke, MA- 413-532-1800



Find a Keeper, the newest, most personal way for singles 40 and over to meet



The Ira of the Ira’s Singles events co-hosts this exciting and fun Event.

You may want to Find a Keeper or you may just want to meet new friends – it’s all good. As the Ira says, “Come Alone, but Never Feel Alone.” Get out and party with other singles this summer.



Food Below is for the Energy to Dance!!!!



Fantastic Food Stations!!



It is at the Delaney House which means the Food will be awesome, and plenty of it.







Honestly, NOT KIDDING- All of this is for 25.00. For our own exclusive BallRoom, All you can eat food, DJ, and the opportunity to meet a Keeper…….. Now, that is a deal.





For tickets, call 413-535-5077 or visit: http://www.logcabin-d.... August 13



Please also send me an email once your ticket has been purchased: mistrchrming@aol.com. Subject Line: August 13. The Singles Dance



Questions: 860-604-5792. Please see Pictures of events at the Delaney House and other Ira’s events, see: www.the irassinglesevents.com
item.how_to_find_us: A Staff member will direct you to our group.
item.name: The Ira-DJ,Music,Dancing,Food, Summer Time Romance...8/13. Friday
